item.description: Creating basic login system for the website

item.description: Diving into tools such as Terraform to utilize IaC. Enhancing CI/CD pipeline and testing.

item.title: API Backend continuation and Frontend integration
item.description: Integrating website frontend and backend services to create an example visitor counter stat.

item.title: Backend technologies and APIs
item.description: Creating backend foundation using AWS Services such as API Gateways, Lambda, and DynamoDB. Exploring IAM Permissions more indepth.

item.title: Building the Frontend
item.description: Building the frontend of the website using HTML,CSS,Javascript and Hugo. Hosting the website on AWS using S3, Cloudfront and Route 53.

item.title: AWS Accounts and Organization
item.description: Creating AWS Accounts and Organization. Using AWS Services such as CodeCommit, CodePipeline and tools such as ORG-FORMATIONS

item.title: AWS SAA Certification Exam
item.description: How I passed SAA-C03 - AWS Solutions Architect-Associate Certification Exam
